{"id":516839857,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1625331212,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/516839857/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"7.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isPalindrome(string s) {\n        string str;\n        for(char ch : s) {\n            if(ch >= 'a' && ch <= 'z') str.append(1, ch);\n            if(ch >= '0' && ch <= '9') str.append(1, ch);\n            if(ch >= 'A' && ch <= 'Z') str.append(1, ch - 'A' + 'a');\n        }\n        string cp = str;\n        reverse(str.begin(), str.end());\n        return str == cp;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome"}
